events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on the morning of May 31st, 2024, resulting in significant front-end damage to their car.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to the nature of the damages reported involving a motor vehicle collision.
Agent Mark Thompson was assigned to the claim and has initiated contact with the claimant to gather further details and offer assistance.
The claimant received confirmation that their auto accident claim has been officially acknowledged and is now under review by our team.
The claimant was requested to submit a police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and a detailed accident statement to support the claim.
All requested documents, including the police report and vehicle photos, were submitted by the claimant within the expected timeframe.
The investigation into the circumstances of the collision began, with an emphasis on verifying the claim details and assessing fault.
The investigation concluded with a report supporting the claimant's account that their vehicle was not at fault in the collision.
A settlement proposal was sent to the claimant outlining the repair costs and compensation amounts approved by the adjuster.
The customer responded positively to the settlement offer, expressing satisfaction with the timely handling of their accident claim.
Following acceptance of the settlement terms, the claim was formally approved for payment to proceed with vehicle repairs.
The insurance payment to cover the auto repairs was successfully issued to the claimantâ€™s repair shop as per the settlement agreement.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation that all repairs were completed and the claimant was satisfied with the resolution.
The closed claim files were archived for record-keeping compliance and future reference if needed by the customer or company.
